page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: {EDUCATION} Pershore is under the jurisdiction of {Hereford and Worcster County Council for its schools. All local schools are maintained by the County and staff are paid by them. At the time of writing a bitter dispute is raging about teacher's pay which is disrupting schools and causing problems for both pupils and parents. {A three tier system}is operated of First, Middle and High Schools. Pershore is served by four schools. { {Abbey Park first and Middle and Cherry {Orchard First.}Catholic children go to {Holy Redeemer Primary School}till the age of eleven. Pupils transfer at thirteen to{Pershore High School}for their senior education. Catholic children transfer at eleven to a Catholic High School in Worcester City.
